messages.title: OUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems can provide the strong opposition Britain needs. Only a vote for the Liberal Democrats will deliver a strong opposition to the Tories on the NHS, schools and jobs. Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party are too busy fighting among themselves to stand up for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A vote for the Liberal Democrats will deliver a strong opposition to Tory cuts to schools and the NHS.
The Conservative Government plans huge cuts to school budgets, threatening the future of young people across the country.
A vote for Nick Clegg will ensure a Liberal Democrat MP who is not afraid to stick to their principles on Europe.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If you want an open, tolerant and united Britain, vote Lib Dem on 8th June.

issues.brexitEurope: Vote for Nick Clegg who is not afraid to stick to their principles on Europe.
issues.education: The Conservative Government plans huge cuts to school budgets, threatening the future of young people across the country.
issues.government: Only the Lib Dems can stand up to the Tories and change the direction of our country.
issues.health: Vote for the Liberal Democrats for strong opposition to Tory cuts to schools and the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: If you are unhappy with the way things are going on Brexit and on the NHS, then this is your moment. The choice could not be clearer. A Labour vote will mean more of the same.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has a strong track record of getting things done in the community as well as in Parliament.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, FREEPOST RSYK-HKSY-EJGE, London, SW1P 3AE

images.caption: Tim Farron's Lib Dems are the real opposition, fighting Tory cuts to schools and the NHS.

examples: Lib Dem MPs will stand up for you, fight the Government and change Britain's future for the better.
Only a vote for the Liberal Democrats will deliver a strong opposition to the Tories on the NHS, schools and jobs.
Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party are too busy fighting among themselves to stand up for you.
Vote for the Liberal Democrats for strong opposition to Tory cuts to schools and the NHS.
A vote for Nick Clegg will ensure a Liberal Democrat MP who is not afraid to stick to their principles on Europe.
The Conservative Government plans huge cuts to school budgets, threatening the future of young people across the country.
If you want an open, tolerant and united Britain, vote Lib Dem on 8th June.
Only the Lib Dems can stand up to the Tories and change the direction of our country.
Only the Lib Dems can provide the strong opposition Britain needs. Only a vote for the Liberal Democrats will deliver a strong opposition to the Tories on the NHS, schools, and jobs.
Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party are too busy fighting among themselves to stand up for you.
Has a strong track record of getting things done in the community as well as in Parliament.
